articles.description: Rashod Bateman, the reigning Big Ten receiver of the year, won't be back with the Gophers when their current pause for COVID-19 ends.
articles.content:
Rashod Bateman opted out, opted back in and is now out again.
The star Gophers receiver announced Wednesday on Twitter that he plans to forgo the rest of the 2020 season. This came amid a COVID-19 o… [+3288 chars]
